values.description: If you use any commands which interact with the cloud, you must log in using your QuantConnect account so the CLI can send authenticated API requests.
values.keywords: lean cli, local development, quantconnect cloud, getting started, initialization, authentication, lean login, lean logout
values.og:description: If you use any commands which interact with the cloud, you must log in using your QuantConnect account so the CLI can send authenticated API requests.
values.og:title: Authenticating Accounts - Documentation QuantConnect.com
